remarks: The isomorphism H maps to a set of vectors.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Mar-2014.)
statement:
dihrnss.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihrnss.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihrnss.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihrnss.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dihrnss $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ X e. ran I ) -> X C_ V ) $.
